product_name: Thule Podium Foot Pack - Set of 4
long_description: These mounts are designed as the strongest, best-fitting Thule system for mounting on aerodynamic vehicles with fixed-point rack attachment locations. Designed exclusively for use with Thule Load Bars, sold separately. Can be locked in place using Thule One Key System lock cylinders, sold separately. Designed for use with custom-fitting Thule Fit Kits, sold separately. Refer to the Thule Online Fitting Guide to determine if this system will fit your car's make, model and year.
short_description: These mounts are designed as the strongest, best-fitting Thule system for mounting on aerodynamic vehicles with fixed-point rack attachment locations.
